product.description: Light weight , Breathable Spacer Mesh. 3D Splash Printing on 3 Stripes & special grains printing on heel cap gives the shoe a vibrant & bold look. Ortholite sock liner for better cushioning. They feature a textile upper and a supportive cage that wraps aroundthe midfoot to give you stability where you need it most. Outsole : ADIWEAR: outsolefor best durability in high wear areas.
product.name: Adifloss M Running Shoes For Men  (Blue)
